column4: If I use a USB pen on linux and I hardly ever take it out and put an entry in the fstab.. can I rely on it being ready when linux is booted?
Anyone got a yes or a no here?
Yes means that it can be done.... no means it can't be done :P
why bother putting it in the fstab? The way ubuntu handles usb drives, it should pick it up whenever it's plugged in
